title: Textile, 1913
medium:
Medium: silk 
Technique: block printed on plain weave
dimensions:
H x W (a): 18.1 x 27.3 cm (7 1/8 x 10 3/4 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 14.9 x 4.8 cm (5 7/8 x 1 7/8 in.)
Warp x Weft (c): 19.1 x 7.9 cm (7 1/2 x 3 1/8 in.)
Warp x Weft (d): 18.7 x 15.6 cm (7 3/8 x 6 1/8 in.)
Warp x Weft (e): 18.7 x 28.3 cm (7 3/8 x 11 1/8 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Long stalks of very pointed, overlapping leaves; (a) gray and white on black; (b) dark and light green on yellow; (c) red and ochre on black; (d) dark and light green on ivory; (e) dark and light green on black.

1913. Medium: silk
